T02D1443:243b-1: bha ga b'an shr'i tsakra sam ba ra sya s'a dha nam ratna ts'u da ma ni n'a ma /
T02D1443:243b-3: bcom ldan 'das dpal 'khor lo bde mchog gi sgrub
T02D1443:243b-4: thabs rin po che gtsug gi nor bu zhes bya
T02D1443:243b-5: ba / bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1443:243b-6: yi dags gdan la gar gyis bzhugs shing zhal bzhi
T02D1443:243b-7: bee d'ura padma r'a gser mar gad spyan gsum byi
T02D1443:243b-8: ru bcag 'dra'i zhal gcig phyag gnyis thod khrag cad
T02D1443:243b-9: te'u bsnams pa'i rdo rje rnal 'byor ma //
T02D1443:244a-0: zhabs gnyis mnyam 'khril zhal sbyar sku la rtsa ba'i phyag gnyis dril bu @244a * //
T02D1443:244a-1: rdo rje la sogs 'khyud cing tha ma gnyis kyis
T02D1443:244a-2: glang chen thal kar ko rlon mi lpags khrag gi
T02D1443:244a-4: lhag ma g-yon pa'i phyag rnams kyis ni rim pa
T02D1443:244a-5: bzhin du mdzes pa'i 'khar gsil thong pa khrag bkang
T02D1443:244a-6: rdo rje zhags ba tshangs ba chen po'i mgo rnams
T02D1443:244a-7: 'od zer rab tu 'bar pa legs par bsnams //
T02D1443:244a-8: de bzhin g-yas rnams 'khor lo rtsibs bcu mdud rtse
T02D1443:244a-9: gsum pa lcags kyu cang te'u bsnams ba rgyal chen
T02D1443:244a-10: shr'i he ru ka bde mchog 'khor lo bcom ldan
T02D1443:244a-11: rlabs kyis 'gro kun rtag tu rgyal gyur cig /
T02D1443:244a-12: dpal ldan bla ma rje btsun dang ni der rjes
T02D1443:244a-14: chu zla sogs mtshungs rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma la'ang gus pas phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1443:244a-15: bla ma chen po slob ma mkhas pa'i gus pa drin gsol gdab pa yis //
T02D1443:244a-16: de yi sgrub thabs myur du dga' ba rgyas byed gsal bar bshad par bya //
T02D1443:244a-17: de la dang po rnal 'byor pa dad pa dang
T02D1443:244a-18: thos pa la sogs pas chos thams cad sgyu ma
T02D1443:244a-19: lta bu dang nam mkha' lta bur yongs su shes
T02D1443:244a-20: pa / snying rje dang ldan pa /
T02D1443:244a-21: sbyin pa dang byams pa la sogs pa goms par byas la //
T02D1443:244a-22: 'jig rten gyi chos brgyad kyis ma gos pa /
T02D1443:244a-23: bla ma rje btsun yang dag par mnyes par bya ba sngon du song bas /
T02D1443:244a-24: dpal bde mchog gi rgyud las gsungs pa'i cho ga
T02D1443:244a-25: bzhin du dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa rim pa bzhin
T02D1443:244a-26: du dbang bskur zhing rjes su gnas pa dang dam
T02D1443:244a-27: tshig thob pa / bla ma dang 'dod pa'i lha la tha mi dad par 'dzin pa'i blo can /
T02D1443:244a-28: spyod pa dang brtul zhugs dang ldan pas /
T02D1443:244a-29: dur khrod la sogs pa yid dang rjes su mthun pa'i gnas su /
T02D1443:244a-30: sna tshogs rdo rje'i stan la legs par 'dug pas
T02D1443:244a-31: bdud rtsi'i ri lu la yi ge gsum bzlas pas
T02D1443:244a-32: kha dag pa la sogs pa byas nas sems can
T02D1443:244a-33: thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir bdag
T02D1443:244a-34: dpal rdo rje he ru ka nyid du gyur par
T02D1443:244a-35: bya'o snyam pa'i bsam pa brtan pas ;
T02D1443:244a-36: rang gi snying gar ram las byung ba'i nyi ma'i
T02D1443:244a-37: dkyil 'khor gyi steng du rang gi lha'i sa bon
T02D1443:244a-38: 'od zer kha dog rnam pa lnga kun nas rab
T02D1443:244a-40: de'i 'od zer gyi snang bas rang gi lus kyi
T02D1443:244a-41: nad nas ba sbu'i rtse mo'i bar khyab par byas
T02D1443:244b-0: pas bdag nyid 'dod pa'i lha'i ngo bor @244b gyur
T02D1443:244b-2: de las 'od zer gyi tshogs ba spu'i bu gnas 'phros pas /
T02D1443:244b-3: dpal bde mchog 'khor lo rigs drug gang 'dod pa'i
T02D1443:244b-4: dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo lha bcu bzhi pa'i bdag
T02D1443:244b-5: nyid spro ba dang bsdu ba'i sku /
T02D1443:244b-6: rin po che sna tshogs pa las grub pa'i khang
T02D1443:244b-7: pa brtsegs ma dang bcas pa dur khrod brgyad kyis
T02D1443:244b-8: bskor ba / shar phyogs kyi dur khrod dbang po'i
T02D1443:244b-9: mdun na bla ma seng ge'i khri rin po che
T02D1443:244b-10: sna tshogs pas spras pa'i steng na gser gyi padma
T02D1443:244b-11: kha bye ba la rdo rje sems dpa' ltar 'gying
T02D1443:244b-12: bag tu rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan nas bzhugs pa
T02D1443:244b-13: snang bar gyur pa gsal bar bltas la ;
T02D1443:244b-14: de nas rang gi lus du ma sna tshogs par sprul la /
T02D1443:244b-15: bdag bla ma rdo rje 'chang chen po la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1443:244b-16: bdag bcom ldan 'das dpal 'khor lo bde mchog gi lha chogs la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1443:244b-17: bdag sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1443:244b-18: sems can thams cad rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par
T02D1443:244b-19: bya ba'i phyir lus 'di dag dbul bar bgyi'o zhes
T02D1443:244b-20: bya'o // de nas de dag la rang gi snying
T02D1443:244b-21: ga'i sa bon las byung ba'i pi wang ma la
T02D1443:244b-22: sogs pa'i mchod pa'i lha mo bcu drug dang /
T02D1443:244b-23: ma tang gi la sogs pa bzhi'i tshogs kyis phyi
T02D1443:244b-24: nang gsang ba'i mchod ba rnams kyis yang dag par
T02D1443:244b-26: pi wang gling bu rdza rda rda chen ma //
T02D1443:244b-27: sngon mo ser mo dmar mo ljang ku rnams //
T02D1443:244b-28: dang po'i phyag gnyis rang rtags phyag mtshan can //
T02D1443:244b-29: de dag mtha' gnyis rdo rje dril bu 'dzin //
T02D1443:244b-30: bzhad ma sgeg mo glu ma gar ma rnams //
T02D1443:244b-31: dmar skya sngon mo ser mo ljang gu ste //
T02D1443:244b-32: dang po'i phyag gnyis rang rang rtags mtshan ldan //
T02D1443:244b-33: g-yon mtha' thod pa kha tv'am cad te'u g-yas //
T02D1443:244b-34: me tog bdug ba snang gsal dri chab ma //
T02D1443:244b-35: dkar mo mthing dmar dmar ser dkar mo rnams //
T02D1443:244b-36: g-yon gnyis thod pa kha tv'am g-yas dang po //
T02D1443:244b-37: rang ming rjes mthun gnyis pa cang te'u 'dzin //
T02D1443:244b-38: gzugs ma ro ma reg ma chos ma rnams //
T02D1443:244b-39: dkar mo dmar mo ljang gu dmar mo ste //
T02D1443:244b-40: g-yon g-yas mtha' 'di rnams ni gong dang mtshungs //
T02D1443:244b-41: g-yas kyi dang po rang ming mthun rtags can //
T02D1443:244b-42: kun kyang zhal gcig phyag bzhi ma la sgeg /
T02D1443:245a-0: @245a * // lang tsho gzhon pa rol cing 'gying bag can //
T02D1443:245a-1: rin chen rgyan ldan dar gyis rab tu mdzes //
T02D1443:245a-2: dpag med rang sngags brjod cing mgon sogs rje //
T02D1443:245a-3: aom a'a: badzra b'i ne h'um /
T02D1443:245a-4: aom a'a: badzra bam se h'um /
T02D1443:245a-5: aom a'a: badzra mu ra dze h'um /
T02D1443:245a-6: aom a'a: badzra mu kun de h'um /
T02D1443:245a-7: aom a'a: badzra h'a sye h'um /
T02D1443:245a-8: aom a'a: badzra l'a sye h'um /
T02D1443:245a-9: aom a'a: badzra g'i tye h'um /
T02D1443:245a-10: aom a'a: badzra nir te h'um /
T02D1443:245a-12: aom a'a: badzra dh'u pe h'um /
T02D1443:245a-13: aom a'a: badzra d'i pe h'um /
T02D1443:245a-16: aom a'a: badzra a'a darshe h'um /
T02D1443:245a-17: aom a'a: badzra r'a sye h'um /
T02D1443:245a-19: aom a'a: badzra dharme h'um zhes bya'o //
T02D1443:245a-20: ma tang dom b'i ra dza pukka si //
T02D1443:245a-21: 'og nas 'chad bzhin rang rang zhal sogs ldan //
T02D1443:245a-22: rus pa'i rgyan can thod pa bdud rtsis bkang //
T02D1443:245a-23: brjod pa med par 'dren pa 'khor bcas mchod //
T02D1443:245a-24: rje btsun nyid phyag rgya dang snyoms par zhugs pas
T02D1443:245a-25: mchog tu dga' ba dam pa'i bde ba chen pos
T02D1443:245a-26: dgyes pa de kho na nyid kyi mchod pa yang
T02D1443:245a-27: bya'o // de nas de dag gi spyan sngar sdig
T02D1443:245a-28: pa bshad ba la sogs pa 'di ltar bya ste
T02D1443:245a-29: bya'o // / bdag gis sdig pa thams cad bla
T02D1443:245a-30: ma dang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams
T02D1443:245a-31: cad kyi spyan sngar so sor bshags shing slan chad
T02D1443:245a-32: kyang sdom par bgyid lags so //
T02D1443:245a-33: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang 'phags pa
T02D1443:245a-34: so so'i skye bo'i dge ba thams cad la rjes
T02D1443:245a-36: bdag gis dge ba thams cad bla na med pa
T02D1443:245a-37: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngo bar
T02D1443:245a-38: bgyi'o // bdag byang chub kyi bar du de bzhin
T02D1443:245a-39: gshegs pa thams cad bsdus pa'i ngo bo dpal 'khor
T02D1443:245a-40: lo bde mchog sangs rgyas la skyabs su mchi'o //
T02D1443:245a-41: des bstan pa'i gsang sngags dang phyag rgya la sogs pa'i ngo bo chos la skyabs su mchi'o //
T02D1443:245a-42: de'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor ma'i tshogs dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi'o //
T02D1443:245a-43: sems can thams cad kyi sgrib ba thams cad bsal ba'i phyir /
T02D1443:245a-44: nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyis chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bskul lo //
T02D1443:245a-45: rgyal ba mya ngan las bda' bar bzhed pa rnams
T02D1443:245b-0: 'gro ba kun la phan pa dang @245b bde ba'i
T02D1443:245b-1: don du bskal pa zhing gi rdul snyed du bzhugs
T02D1443:245b-3: sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba
T02D1443:245b-4: dang mchog tu mthar phyin pa'i mya ngan las 'das
T02D1443:245b-5: ba sangs rgyas kyi byang chub la dgod pa'i slad
T02D1443:245b-6: du bdag bla na med pa yang dag bar rdzogs
T02D1443:245b-7: ba'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bgyi'o //
T02D1443:245b-8: bdag bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi bar du
T02D1443:245b-9: rdo rje'i theg pa la brten par bgyi'o zhes bya
T02D1443:245b-10: ba ste / de rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs par bsam zhing /
T02D1443:245b-11: aom badzra satva sa ma ya ma nu p'a la
T02D1443:245b-12: ya badzra satva tve no pa tishtha dridho me bha
T02D1443:245b-13: ba / su to shyo me bha ba /
T02D1443:245b-14: su po shyo me bha ba /
T02D1443:245b-15: aa nu rak to me bha ba /
T02D1443:245b-17: sarba karma su tsa me tsittam shre ya: ku ru h'um /
T02D1443:245b-19: bha ga b'an sarba ta th'a ga ta badzra m'a
T02D1443:245b-20: me munytsa badzr'i bha ba ma h'a sa ma ya
T02D1443:245b-22: mi snang bar gyur pa dang /
T02D1443:245b-25: mchod pa po dbyer med par bsam par bya'o //
T02D1443:245b-26: de nas sems can thams cad lha'i bde ba la nye bar sbyar ba'i rnam pa byams ba dang /
T02D1443:245b-27: sdug bsngal dang sdug bsngal gyi rgyu dang bral bar bya ba'i rnam pa snying rje dang /
T02D1443:245b-28: lha'i bde ba dang 'khor ba ji srid bar mi 'bral bar bya ba'i rnam pa dga' ba dang /
T02D1443:245b-29: nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa'i gnyen
T02D1443:245b-30: po lam la nye bar sbyar bar bya ba'i rnam
T02D1443:245b-31: pa btang snyoms bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1443:245b-32: de nas chos thams cad ngo bo nyid med pa
T02D1443:245b-33: yang dag pa ma yin pa'i kun du rtog pa
T02D1443:245b-34: tsam sgyu ma lta bu'o zhes nges par byas la
T02D1443:245b-35: / aom sva bh'a ba shuddha: sarba dharm'a: sva bh'a ba shuddho& ham /
T02D1443:245b-37: sa bon gyis ni brtan g-yo sbyangs //
T02D1443:245b-38: thig le sngags kyis dmigs pa med //
T02D1443:245b-39: aom sh'un+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham /
T02D1443:245b-40: chos thams cad ni rab tu gnas pa med pa
T02D1443:245b-41: rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba ston ka'i nyi ma
T02D1443:245b-42: gung gi nam mkha'i dri ma med pa lta bu
T02D1443:245b-44: de nas stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin las der
T02D1443:245b-45: yi ge ae yongs su gyur ba la chos 'byung
T02D1443:245b-46: gi gzugs ston ka'i ri bong can ltar dkar ba
T02D1443:245b-47: / rdo rje 'chang chen po'i ngo bo //
T02D1443:245b-48: sna tshogs pa'i ngo mtshar che ba'i 'od zer gyi tshogs mngon par 'byung ba /
T02D1443:245b-49: mgo phra ba steng yangs pa zur gsum pa /
T02D1443:246a-2: de'i dbus su yi ge h'um gi bdag nyid zhal
T02D1443:246a-3: gcig phyag gnyis pa'i he ru ka'i gzugs su mngon
T02D1443:246a-4: par sprul la / shar phyogs lugs dang mi mthun dang //
T02D1443:246a-5: lugs mthun g-yon mdzub se gol gtogs //
T02D1443:246a-6: aom sumbha ni sumbha h'um h'um phat /
T02D1443:246a-7: aom grihna grihna h'um h'um phat /
T02D1443:246a-8: aom grihn'a pa ya grihn'a pa ya h'um h'um phat /
T02D1443:246a-9: aom a'a na ya ho bha ga b'a na badzra h'um h'um phat /
T02D1443:246a-10: zhes sngags rkang pa re re brjod pa'i tshe /
T02D1443:246a-11: sngags de dang de kha dog dmar po 'bar ba
T02D1443:246a-12: yig 'bru che ba phyogs de dang der kha nas
T02D1443:246a-13: 'phros pas / sngags de dang de las 'phros pa'i
T02D1443:246a-14: lha mo khva gdong ma la sogs pa zhal gcig
T02D1443:246a-15: 'phros pas / phyag gnyis ma / kha dog dmar
T02D1443:246a-16: mo cher 'bar g-yas brkyang gom pas nyi ma'i gdan
T02D1443:246a-17: 'phros pas / phyag gnyis ma / // phyag rgya
T02D1443:246a-18: lngas brgyan gtum pa rab tu che zhing gzugs rags
T02D1443:246a-20: phyag g-yon lte ba man chad zur gsum stong ni
T02D1443:246a-22: rang 'dra thogs // g-yas pa tho ba can rnams
T02D1443:246a-23: rang rang phyogs su spro bar bya ;
T02D1443:246a-24: / de dag gis ni bgegs rnams shin tu thag ring bskrad par bsam //
T02D1443:246a-25: de nas sngags de dag las grub pa'i rdo rje rab gru bzhi pa rab tu 'bar ba /
T02D1443:246a-26: rgyar sgrub pa po ji tsam mngon par 'dod pa bsams la /
T02D1443:246a-27: aom badzra pr'a k'a ra h'um bam h'um zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis byin gyis brlab pa'o //
T02D1443:246a-28: de nas rdo rje ra ba las /
T02D1443:246a-30: 'phros pas dbus su yi ge h'um //
T02D1443:246a-31: las grub sna tshogs rdo rje bsam //
T02D1443:246a-32: de las sna tshogs rdo rje'i rang bzhin gyi sar byas la /
T02D1443:246a-33: aom me di ni badzri bha ba badzra pandha h'um /
T02D1443:246a-35: de bzhin dus dang ra ba las 'od 'phros par gyur to //
T02D1443:246a-37: bla re las mda'i dra ba phyi rol du steng
T02D1443:246a-38: dang logs kun du khyab par bsam zhing de dang
T02D1443:246a-39: de dag tu aom badzra panytsa ra h'um bam h'um
T02D1443:246a-40: / aom badzra bi d'a na h'um kham h'um /
T02D1443:246a-41: aom badzra sa ra dz'a la tr'am sam tr'am /
T02D1443:246a-42: zhes bya bas byin gyis brlab bo //
T02D1443:246a-43: khva gdong ma la sogs pa brgyad ni phyi rol du /
T02D1443:246a-44: kha bltas 'khod pa rnams kyi mdun du h'um //
T02D1443:246a-45: nag po brgyad bltas de dag yongs gyur las //
T02D1443:246a-46: dang po kha khyer phan tshun phrad brgyad bas ma //
T02D1443:246a-47: de nas khra gdong la sogs pa'i 'od zer 'bar ba'i tshogs kyis bgegs rnams dong du chud cing /
T02D1443:246b-0: dong gi pha rol nas @246b kyang bgegs bros pa
T02D1443:246b-1: rnams 'od zer 'bar ba lcags kyu'i rnam pas drangs
T02D1443:246b-2: shing dong du bcug pa dang /
T02D1443:246b-3: khva gdong ma la sogs pa dong gi drung na
T02D1443:246b-4: 'khod pa rnams la bdag nyid khro po'i lta ba
T02D1443:246b-5: dang bcas pas / aom gha: gha: gh'a ta ya gh'a ta ya sarba dusht'a na h'um h'um phat /
T02D1443:246b-6: k'i la ya k'i la ya sarba p'a pham h'um h'um phat ;
T02D1443:246b-7: h'um h'um h'um badzra k'i la ya badzra dha ra
T02D1443:246b-8: a'a dzny'a pa ya ti sarba bi gha n'a na
T02D1443:246b-9: ka ya w'a ka tsitta badzra k'i la ya h'um
T02D1443:246b-10: phat / zhes bya ba brjod de phur pa tshugs
T02D1443:246b-11: shig bar bka' bsgo pas bgegs rnams kyi spyi bor
T02D1443:246b-13: aom badzra mudga ra badzra k'i la ya a'a ko ta ya h'um phat /
T02D1443:246b-14: ces brjod pas de dag gi rdo rje tho bas phur pa brdungs te /
T02D1443:246b-15: bgegs rnams la phur pa btab pas bgegs rnams kyis bde ba thob par byas nas /
T02D1443:246b-16: khva gdod ma la sogs pa 'od zer 'bar ba'i
T02D1443:246b-17: tshogs su gyur te mda'i dra ba la thim ma
T02D1443:246b-18: thag tu chu la chu brdabs pa'i tshul du slar
T02D1443:246b-20: rdo rje'i rab zlum por gyur par bsams la /
T02D1443:246b-21: aom badzra pr'a k'a ra h'um zhes bya bas byin gyis brlab bo //
T02D1443:246b-22: de bzhin du de las 'od 'phros pas padma'i ra ba /
T02D1443:246b-24: de nas rdo rje me 'bar ba steng dang logs
T02D1443:246b-25: kun du khyab pa g-yon skor du 'khyil zhing 'bar
T02D1443:246b-26: bar bsams te / de bzhin du aom padma pra k'a ra h'um /
T02D1443:246b-27: aom tsakra pr'a k'a ra h'um /
T02D1443:246b-28: aom badzra dzva la aa na l'arka h'um h'um h'um
T02D1443:246b-29: zhes so so'i sngags kyis byin gyis brlabs la bdag
T02D1443:246b-30: nyid skad cig gis mi snang bar gyur par bsam
T02D1443:246b-31: mo // de ltar tshangs pa stong gis kyang mi
T02D1443:246b-32: tshugs pa'i gnas der rten dang brten pa'i dkyil 'khor
T02D1443:246b-33: sgyu ma lta bur bsam par bya ste /
T02D1443:246b-34: yi ge yam las yang dag byung //
T02D1443:246b-35: rlung gi dkyil 'khor gzhur snang ngo //
T02D1443:246b-36: 'od zer sngon po 'khrug cing 'khrug / ba dan gyis mtshan bsam par bya //
T02D1443:246b-37: de steng ram yig las byung ba //
T02D1443:246b-38: me yi dkyil 'khor kha dog dmar ;
T02D1443:246b-39: / gru gsum 'bar phreng gis mtshan pa //
T02D1443:246b-40: 'od zer dmar po 'khrug cing 'khrug / de steng bam yig las byung ba //
T02D1443:246b-41: tshu yi dkyil 'khor zlum zhing dkar //
T02D1443:246b-42: bum pas mtshan pa 'od zer gyi //
T02D1443:246b-43: phreng ba dkar pos 'khrug cing 'khrug / de steng lam yig las byung ba //
T02D1443:247a-2: gru bzhi rdo rje yis mtshan pa //
T02D1443:247a-3: 'od zer ser po 'khrug cing 'khrug / de steng sum yig las byung ba //
T02D1443:247a-4: lhun po rin chen bzhi rang bzhin //
T02D1443:247a-5: gra bzhi rtse mo brgyad kyis mdzes //
T02D1443:247a-6: gzi brjid bzang po mchog gi mchog /
T02D1443:247a-7: de sting pam las pad chen po //
T02D1443:247a-9: de steng h'um yig las sna tshogs //
T02D1443:247a-10: rdo rje shar lho nub byang dbus //
T02D1443:247a-11: dkar ser dmar ljang mthing rtse gsum //
T02D1443:247a-13: de'i stegs bur yi ge bhr'um dkar po las byung
T02D1443:247a-14: ba'i khang pa brtsegs ma sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs
T02D1443:247a-15: su dag pa thams cad bsdus pa'i ngo bo thar
T02D1443:247a-16: pa chen po'i pho brang rnam par snang mdzad kyi
T02D1443:247a-17: rang bzhin / rin po che sna tshogs pa las grub pa /
T02D1443:247a-18: gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa //
T02D1443:247a-19: rta babs bzhi yis rnam par brgyan //
T02D1443:247a-20: ka ba brgyad kyis nye bar mdzes ;
T02D1443:247a-21: / rtsig pa lnga dang yang dag ldan //
T02D1443:247a-22: stegs bu bzhis bskor brgyad gnyis kyis //
T02D1443:247a-24: do shal do phyed dar me tog / nyi zla me long rnga yab dang //
T02D1443:247a-25: rdo rje srad bu bla res mdzes //
T02D1443:247a-27: ba dan rtse mo g-yo bkra ba'i //
T02D1443:247a-28: dril bu phyogs kyi sgo nas 'khrol //
T02D1443:247a-29: dur khrod brgyad kyis yongs su bskor //
T02D1443:247a-31: de'i dbus su sna tshogs pa'i 'dab ma can gyi padma rab tu rgyas pa ste /
T02D1443:247a-32: de'i lte ba la 'jigs byed chen mo dang dus
T02D1443:247a-33: mtshan mo brtsegs pa'i snying gar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor
T02D1443:247a-34: / phyogs kyi 'dab ma rnams la ro'i snying gar zla ba'i gdan dang ldan pa /
T02D1443:247a-35: mtshams bzhir zla la bum steng du //
T02D1443:247a-36: bdud rtsis bkang ba'i thod pa bzhi //
T02D1443:247a-37: phyogs bral dang sgo rnams su yang //
T02D1443:247a-38: ro yi snying gar zla ba'i gdan //
T02D1443:247a-39: de nas dus mtshan mo'i snying kha'i nyi ma'i dkyil
T02D1443:247a-40: 'khor la aa la sogs pa'i dbyangs kyi yi ge
T02D1443:247a-41: bcu drug nyis 'gyur las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor me
T02D1443:247a-42: long lta bu'i ye shes kyi ngo bo //
T02D1443:247a-43: de'i steng du ka la sogs pa'i gsal byed sum
T02D1443:247a-44: cu rtsa bzhi da dha da dha ya la bsnan
T02D1443:247a-45: pa bzhi bcu nyis 'gyur yongs su gyur pa las
T02D1443:247b-0: nyi ma'i @247b dkyil 'khor mnyam pa nyid kyi ye
T02D1443:247b-1: shes / der yi ge h'um dngul chu lta bu
T02D1443:247b-2: yongs su gyur pa las rdo rje rtse lnga pa
T02D1443:247b-3: dkar po rab tu 'bar ba lte bar yi ge
T02D1443:247b-4: h'um gis mtshan pa so sor rtog pa'i ye shes
T02D1443:247b-5: shes / / de las de bzhin gshegs pa mtha'
T02D1443:247b-6: yas pa rnal 'byor ma'i tshogs kyi rnam par snang
T02D1443:247b-7: ba 'phros pas 'gro ba ma lus pa'i don byas
T02D1443:247b-8: shes / / nas / de dag bsdu ba'i sbyor
T02D1443:247b-9: bas sa bon la bcug pas de dag thams cad
T02D1443:247b-10: gcig tu 'gyur ba ni bya ba grub pa'i ye
T02D1443:247b-11: shes / / nas / shes so // de nas
T02D1443:247b-12: de las bdag nyid gtso bo rang gi rig ma
T02D1443:247b-13: dang bcas shing dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo dang bcas
T02D1443:247b-14: par grub pa ni chos kyi dbyings shin tu rnam
T02D1443:247b-15: par dag pa'i ngo bo ste /
T02D1443:247b-17: sngo zhing drag shul rnam 'gyur drag /'jigs pa dag kyang 'jigs par mdzad //
T02D1443:247b-18: mche ba dag kyang gtsigs pa po //
T02D1443:247b-19: gtsug na zla ba phyed pa la //
T02D1443:247b-20: sna tshogs rdo rje ral pas brgyan //
T02D1443:247b-21: thod pa'i phreng bas rnam par bklubs /
T02D1443:247b-22: rgyan rnams thams cad yongs rdzogs shing //
T02D1443:247b-23: sdad ba thams cad 'dul mdzad pa //
T02D1443:247b-24: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gdan la ni //
T02D1443:247b-25: phyed krung byas pas shin tu gnas //
T02D1443:247b-26: sred dang rmongs dang phrag dog gyur //
T02D1443:247b-27: k'a la r'a ti 'og tu mnan //
T02D1443:247b-28: spyan gsum zhal bzhi mgrin pa bzhi //
T02D1443:247b-29: mkha' ltar sdo dang ser dang dmar //
T02D1443:247b-30: steng gi zhal ni ljang gu ste //
T02D1443:247b-31: phag mo dang ni ga nyis med dga' //
T02D1443:247b-32: dril bu rdo rje snyoms 'jug cing //
T02D1443:247b-33: 'khar gsil snod zhags mgo bo dang //
T02D1443:247b-34: chos kyi 'khor lo mdung rtse gsum //
T02D1443:247b-35: rdo rje lcags kyu rde'u chung ste //
T02D1443:247b-36: khrag gi rba klong 'khyil pa yi //
T02D1443:247b-37: glang chen ko rlon gos su gyon //
T02D1443:247b-38: phyag gnyis na ni chos gos so //
T02D1443:247b-39: mi lpags snam bu gnyis kyis 'phyar //
T02D1443:247b-40: lang tsho gzhon pa 'gying bag can //
T02D1443:247b-41: sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan 'chang zhing //
T02D1443:247b-42: dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus brgyan //
T02D1443:247b-43: gar dgu yi ni nyams dang ldan //
T02D1443:247b-44: stag gi pags pa'i na bza' mnabs //
T02D1443:247b-45: phyag rgya drag gis rab tu brgyan //
T02D1443:247b-46: mgo phreng do shal chen po can //
T02D1443:247b-47: steng na gdugs dkar legs par 'dzin //
T02D1443:247b-48: phag mo mdog dmar gcer bu la //
T02D1443:247b-49: spyan gsum skra ni grol ba'o //
T02D1443:247b-50: sgeg cing nu ma 'bur la mkhrang //
T02D1443:248a-2: g-yon pa ro yi lhung bzed de //
T02D1443:248a-3: g-yas pa rde'u chung chos dbyangs sgrogs //
T02D1443:248a-4: byin pa gnyis ni mnyam 'khyud cing //
T02D1443:248a-5: snying rjes dga' ba'i bde ba che //
T02D1443:248a-6: thugs kar shes rab rab gyur nyid //
T02D1443:248a-7: sna tshogs padma nyi rdor h'um //
T02D1443:248a-8: de'i rjes la mgo bo dang mgrin pa dang snying gar zla ba dang nyi ma'i steng du /
T02D1443:248a-9: aom a'a: h'um dkar po dang dmar po dang sngon po'i 'od 'phro ba bsams la /
T02D1443:248a-10: de nas lte bar sprul pa'i 'khor lo'i nang du brgyad /
T02D1443:248a-11: phyi rol du 'dab ma lnga bcu rtsa drug pa
T02D1443:248a-12: kha dog sna tshogs pa'i lte ba la yi ge
T02D1443:248a-13: aam kha dog sna tshogs pa mgo gyen du bstan
T02D1443:248a-14: pa ; snying ga chos kyi 'khor lo 'dab ma
T02D1443:248a-15: brgyad pa kha dog sngon po lte ba la yi
T02D1443:248a-16: ge h'um kha dog sngon po mgo bo thur du
T02D1443:248a-17: pa ; bstan pa / mgrin pa longs spyod kyi
T02D1443:248a-18: 'khor lo 'dab ma dbus na bzhi phyi rol na
T02D1443:248a-19: bcu gnyis pa kha dog dmar po lte ba'i yi
T02D1443:248a-20: ge aom dmar po mgo gyen du bstan pa /
T02D1443:248a-21: spyi bor bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo 'dab ma
T02D1443:248a-22: sum cu rtsa gnyis pa kha dog sngon po lte
T02D1443:248a-23: ba la yi ge ham kha dog dkar po mgo
T02D1443:248a-25: 'khor lo de dag thams cad kyang yi ge dang bcas shing 'od shin tu gsal ba bsgom mo //
T02D1443:248a-26: shar la sogs pa'i 'dab ma la //
T02D1443:248a-27: ma tang gi dang dombi ni //
T02D1443:248a-28: r'a dza ki dang pukka s'i //
T02D1443:248a-29: ser dang sngo dang dmar dud kha //
T02D1443:248a-30: 'khar gsil dang ni lhung bzed dang //
T02D1443:248a-31: rde'u chung dang ni gri gug 'dzin //
T02D1443:248a-32: ba dha ki sa ha tsa ri //
T02D1443:248a-33: bhu dhi tsa ri sha ba ri //
T02D1443:248a-34: skya bo dang ni dmar ba dang //
T02D1443:248a-35: ljang gu dang ni dkar mo ste //
T02D1443:248a-36: thod pa dang ni 'khar gsil dang //
T02D1443:248a-37: gri gug dang ni rde'u chung 'dzin //
T02D1443:248a-38: lugs su 'byung dang lugs las bzlog / bzhad dang zhi dang snying rje dang //
T02D1443:248a-39: sgeg dang rngam dang mi sdug pa //
T02D1443:248a-40: drag shul khro bo'i nyams dang ldan //
T02D1443:248a-41: sgo bzhir khro mo dgod bya ba //
T02D1443:248a-42: he ru ka yi 'od ma dang //
T02D1443:248a-43: rdo rje gtum mo dang rdo rje //
T02D1443:248a-44: srin mo rdo rje 'jigs byed ma ;
T02D1443:248a-45: / drag cing gdul dka' kun gsol ma //
T02D1443:248a-46: thal kar mdog dang ljang gu dang //
T02D1443:248a-47: dmar dang sngo ba drag shul 'jigs //
T02D1443:248a-48: lang tsho gzhon pa nu ma rgyas //
T02D1443:248a-49: lhung bzed kha tv'am 'khar gsil g-yon //
T02D1443:248a-50: chos kyi 'khor lo rde chung g-yas //
T02D1443:248a-51: phrag pa'i steng na chos gos te //
T02D1443:248b-0: kun kyang zhal @248b gcig phyag bzhi ma //
T02D1443:248b-1: rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par bklubs //
T02D1443:248b-2: ro steng zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la //
T02D1443:248b-3: skyil krung phyed pa'i gar gyis gnas //
T02D1443:248b-4: skra grol gcer bu rgyan lnga 'chang //
T02D1443:248b-5: bcom ldan rdo rje rnal 'byor ma //
T02D1443:248b-6: thabs dang shes rab ngo bo nyid //
T02D1443:248b-7: snying rje chen po stong pa nyid /
T02D1443:248b-8: tha mi dad pa'i bdag nyid do //
T02D1443:248b-9: bsod snyoms pa dang chos gos gsum //
T02D1443:248b-10: phyis mi len dang cog pu pa //
T02D1443:248b-11: stan gcig pa dang bla gab med //
T02D1443:248b-12: shing drung pa dang bas mthar gnas //
T02D1443:248b-13: dur khrod pa dang phyag dar khrod //
T02D1443:248b-14: phying ba pa dang gzhi ji bzhin //
T02D1443:248b-15: sbyangs pa'i yon tan bcu gnyis te ;
T02D1443:248b-16: / de rnams rnal 'byor ma rnams dag / mdo yi sde dang dbyangs kyis bsnyad //
T02D1443:248b-17: lung du bstan dang tshigs su bcad //
T02D1443:248b-18: ched du brjod dang gleng gzhi dang //
T02D1443:248b-19: rtog pa brjod dang de ltar byung //
T02D1443:248b-20: skyes pa rabs dang shin tu rgyas //
T02D1443:248b-21: rmad du byung dang gtan la phab //
T02D1443:248b-22: gsung rab yan lag bcu gnyis kyang //
T02D1443:248b-23: rnal 'byor ma yi ngo bo nyid //
T02D1443:248b-24: de nas h'um gi 'od zer gyis dam tshig gi
T02D1443:248b-25: 'khor lo dang 'dra ba'i ye shes sems dpa' dang
T02D1443:248b-26: / dbang bskur ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dang //
T02D1443:248b-27: phyi dang gsang ba'i mchod pa byed pa'i lha mo rnams spyan drangs te /
T02D1443:248b-28: de dag dang lhan cig tu 'ongs pa'i bgegs zhal rnams kyis h'um zhes brjod pas bskrad nas /
T02D1443:248b-29: snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od zer las byung ba'i mchod yon /
T02D1443:248b-30: aom aargham pra t'i tstsha sv'a h'a /
T02D1443:248b-32: dza: h'um bam ho: zhes bya bas dgug pa dang
T02D1443:248b-33: gzhug pa dang bcing ba dang mnyes par byas nas
T02D1443:248b-34: / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bdag la dbang bskur du gsol zhes gsol ba btab pa dang /
T02D1443:248b-35: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams rin po che'i bum pa bdud rtsi lnga'i khu bas gang ba bsnams /
T02D1443:248b-36: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa bhi she ka
T02D1443:248b-37: sa ma ya shri ye h'um zhes gsung zhing dbang
T02D1443:248b-38: bskur ba dang chu'i lhag ma las dbu la rigs
T02D1443:248b-39: kyi bdag pos rgyas gdab par bya ste /
T02D1443:248b-40: de la bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu la rdo rje
T02D1443:248b-41: sems dpa' rdo rje rnal 'byor ma la mi bskyod
T02D1443:248b-42: pa'o // ma tang gi la sogs pa bzhi la rim bzhin du //
T02D1443:248b-43: rtag pa don grub 'od dpag med dang rin chen 'byung //
T02D1443:248b-44: ba dha k'i la sogs pa la ni rtag pa dang //
T02D1443:249a-0: @249a * // rin chen dbang dang 'od dpag med dang don yod grub //
T02D1443:249a-1: he ru ka bha la sogs pa la yang ma
T02D1443:249a-2: tang gi la sogs pa la rtag pa la sogs
T02D1443:249a-3: pa bzhin no // de nas pi wang ma la sogs pa dang /
T02D1443:249a-4: ma tang gi la sogs pa shin tu mdzes shing
T02D1443:249a-5: yid 'phrog pa rnams kyis yang dag par mchod par
T02D1443:249a-6: bya'o // de nas lha mo de dag gis legs par bstod pa byas nas /
T02D1443:249a-7: lha mo de rnams rang rang gi gnas su yud kyis gshegs par bsam mo //
T02D1443:249a-8: de'i rjes la yi ge h'um las gsang ba'i rdo
T02D1443:249a-9: rje dkar po by'a las nor bu dmar po by'a
T02D1443:249a-10: ser pos bu ga bkag pa ;
T02D1443:249a-11: yi ge a'a las phyag rgya'i padma dmar po 'dab
T02D1443:249a-12: ma gsum pa dhyam las ze'u 'bru dkar po dhyam
T02D1443:249a-13: ser pos bu ga bkag par bsams la /
T02D1443:249a-14: lte ba la sogs pa la snying po la sogs pa yang bkod nas /
T02D1443:249a-15: aom shr'i ma h'a su kha badzra he he ru
T02D1443:249a-16: ru kam a'a: h'um h'um phat sv'a h'a zhes bya
T02D1443:249a-17: bas dga' ba tsam zhig lhan cig skyes pa'i dga'
T02D1443:249a-18: ba dam pa'i bde bas bdag dang dkyil 'khor par
T02D1443:249a-19: bcas pa rjes su mnyes par bya'o //
T02D1443:249a-20: phyi rol shin tu dga' ba'i bya ba la'ang //
T02D1443:249a-21: padma rdo rje byin rlabs 'di dag bya //
T02D1443:249a-22: mdun du yi ge yam las rlung dkyil 'khor //
T02D1443:249a-23: gzhur snang sngon po mtha' gnyis pa dan ldan ;
T02D1443:249a-24: / de steng yi ge ram las me'i dkyil 'khor //
T02D1443:249a-25: zur gsum nyid la dmar po 'bar bas mtshan //
T02D1443:249a-26: de steng aa las padma'i snod //
T02D1443:249a-27: dum bu gcig pa nang dmar po //
T02D1443:249a-28: de'i nang du shar nas brtsams te dbus kyi bar du aom kham a'am tr'am h'um /
T02D1443:249a-29: dkar po dang ljang gu dang dmar po dang ser
T02D1443:249a-30: po dang mthing ga rnams las byung ba'i gsang ba'i
T02D1443:249a-31: sman dang sha chen po dang /
T02D1443:249a-32: byang chub kyi sems dang rang byung gi me tog dang /
T02D1443:249a-33: rdo rje'i chu rnams la slar yi ge de dag nyid kyis mtshan pa dang /
T02D1443:249a-34: me dang bden bral rlung dang dbang ldan gyi phyogs su l'am m'am p'am t'am //
T02D1443:249a-35: dkar dang sdo dang dmar dang ljang //
T02D1443:249a-36: ba lang khye dang glang po che dang rta'i sgron ma dang /
T02D1443:249a-37: sa bon de dag nyid kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'o //
T02D1443:249a-38: de nas rlung gis me sbar bas //
T02D1443:249a-39: de dag thams cad zhu bar gyur pa /
T02D1443:249a-40: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ltar dmar por 'bar ba snang ba /
T02D1443:249a-41: de'i steng du yi ge h'um dkar po yongs su
T02D1443:249b-0: gyur pa las kha tv'am ga @249b dkar po mgo
T02D1443:249b-1: thur du bstan pa byang chub kyi sems kyi rang
T02D1443:249b-3: bdud rtse de shin tu mdog dkar po bsil ba'i rnam par gyur par blta'o //
T02D1443:249b-4: de nas a'a li dang k'a li thog mar aom
T02D1443:249b-5: dang mtha' mar h'um h'um phat dang bcas pa brjod
T02D1443:249b-6: pas / yi ge de dag nyid kha dog sna
T02D1443:249b-7: tshogs pa bdud rtsi'i steng du gnas par bltas la
T02D1443:249b-8: pas / / slar yang yi ge de dag nyid
T02D1443:249b-9: aom a'a: h'um zhes bya ba'i yi ge gsum dkar
T02D1443:249b-10: po dang dmar po dang mthing ga'i kha dog can
T02D1443:249b-11: gong nas gong du gnas par gyur par bltas te
T02D1443:249b-12: pas / / / de dag las 'od zer gyi
T02D1443:249b-13: tshogs dpag tu med pa 'phros pas phyogs bcu'i nam
T02D1443:249b-14: mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
T02D1443:249b-15: kyi thugs ka'i sa bon gyi cha las /
T02D1443:249b-16: ye shes kyi bdud rtsi bkug ste yi ge gsum la bsdus pa dang /
T02D1443:249b-17: yi ge gsum yang rim pa bzhin du bdud rtsir lhung bas /
T02D1443:249b-18: de dag ro gcig tu gyur pa'i bdud rtsi'i mchog tu bltas nas /
T02D1443:249b-19: yi ge gsum gyis lan gsum byin gyis brlabs la /
T02D1443:249b-21: rnams kyi lce la yi ge h'um //
T02D1443:249b-22: las byung rdo rje rtse gsum pa //
T02D1443:249b-23: dkar po nas 'bru tsam bkod de //
T02D1443:249b-24: de yi 'od kyis bu gus drangs //
T02D1443:249b-25: bdud rtsi gsol bas mchog tshim blta ;
T02D1443:249b-26: / rig sngags bzlas brjod byas pas 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa'i phyir bzlas brjod bya ste /
T02D1443:249b-27: de ni rdo rje'i bzlas pa dang /
T02D1443:249b-28: bzlas brjod bya ba'i gsang sngags kyi yi ge gang
T02D1443:249b-29: dag yin pa rnams rang gi thugs ka'i sa bon
T02D1443:249b-30: las 'og nas byung ba rang gi rdo rje'i rtse
T02D1443:249b-31: mo nas phyag rgya'i bha gar bton nas /
T02D1443:249b-32: yang lha mo'i zhal nas rang gi zhal du zhugs
T02D1443:249b-33: pa rang gi sa bon la zhugs par blta zhing
T02D1443:249b-34: / zhal thams cad dang rnal 'byor ma thams cad kyis kyang sngags zlos par bsgom par bya ste /
T02D1443:249b-35: khro bo'i bzlas pa yang bya'o //
T02D1443:249b-36: rim pa 'dis bzlas brjod kyi nyes pa dang bral
T02D1443:249b-37: bar sems mnyam par gzhag pas ji srid skyo bar
T02D1443:249b-38: ma gyur gyi bar du bzlas brjod bya'o //
T02D1443:249b-39: de la bzlas brjod kyi sngags ni 'di dag yin te /
T02D1443:249b-40: aom shr'i badzra he he ru ru kam h'um h'um
T02D1443:249b-41: phat d'a ki ni dz'a la sam ba ra sv'a
T02D1443:249b-42: h'a / aom hr'i: ha ha hum h'um phat /
T02D1443:249b-43: lha'i snying po dang nye ba'i snying po'o //
T02D1443:250a-1: buddha d'a ki n'i ye badzra barnna n'i ye hum h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02D1443:250a-2: aom badzra bee ro tsa n'i ye hum h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02D1443:250a-3: lha mo'i snying po dang nye ba'i snying po'o //
T02D1443:250a-4: aom m'a tam g'i hum h'um phat /
T02D1443:250a-5: aom dombi n'i hum h'um phat /
T02D1443:250a-6: aom r'a dza k'i hum h'um phat /
T02D1443:250a-7: aom pukka s'i hum h'um phat /
T02D1443:250a-8: aom ba dha ki hum h'um phat /
T02D1443:250a-9: aom sa ha tsa ri hum h'um phat /
T02D1443:250a-10: aom bu dhi tsa ri hum h'um phat /
T02D1443:250a-11: aom sha ba r'i hum h'um phat /
T02D1443:250a-12: aom he ru ka bha hum h'um phat /
T02D1443:250a-13: aom badzra tsand'a l'i hum h'um phat /
T02D1443:250a-14: aom badzra raksha s'i hum h'um phat /
T02D1443:250a-15: aom badzra bhee ra bi hum h'um phat /
T02D1443:250a-17: aom na mo bha ga wa te w'i re sh'a ya /
T02D1443:250a-18: ma h'a kalp'a gni sam ni bh'a ya /
T02D1443:250a-19: dza ta ma kutotka t'a ya /
T02D1443:250a-20: dam shtr'a ka r'a lo gra bh'i sha na mu kh'a ya /
T02D1443:250a-21: sa ha sra bhu dza bh'a su r'a ya /
T02D1443:250a-22: pa ra shu p'a sho dya ta sh'u la kha tv'am ga dh'a ri ni /
T02D1443:250a-23: by'a ghr'a dzi n'amba ra dha r'a ya /
T02D1443:250a-24: ma h'a dhumbr'a ndha ka ra wa bu sh'a ya /
T02D1443:250a-25: ka ra ka ra ku ru ku ru /
T02D1443:250a-27: tr'a sa ya tr'a sa ya /
T02D1443:250a-28: ksho bha ya ksho bha ya /
T02D1443:250a-35: ba sa ru dhi r'a na tra m'a l'a ba lam ne /
T02D1443:250a-36: grihna grihna sapta p'a t'a la ga ta bhu dzam ga sarbam ba ta rdza ya tardza ya /
T02D1443:250a-37: a'a kaddhya a'a kaddhya hrim hrim /
T02D1443:250a-49: aom shr'i tsitta d'a ka dhri ka aa kham hum h'um phat /
T02D1443:250a-50: d'a ki n'i dz'a la sam ba ra sv'a h'a /
T02D1443:250a-51: aom shr'i b'a ka d'a ka a'a ro li k'a
T02D1443:250a-52: d'a ki ni dz'a la sam ba ra hum h'um
T02D1443:250a-53: phat / aom shr'i k'a ya d'a ki n'i dz'a
T02D1443:250a-54: la sam ba ra ru lu bhr'um hum h'um phat
T02D1443:250a-55: phat / sv'a h'a / aom shr'i ratna d'a ka
T02D1443:250a-56: ya aom a'a: h'um d'a ki ni dz'a la sam
T02D1443:250a-57: ba ra hum h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02D1443:250a-58: aom shr'i karma d'a ka aa kham h'um d'a ki
T02D1443:250a-59: ni dz'a la sam ba ra hum h'um phat sv'a
T02D1443:250a-60: h'a / gtso bo lnga'i sngags so //
T02D1443:250a-61: gang tshe bzlas pas skyo bar gyur pa na //
T02D1443:250a-62: sa bon 'od kyis shes rab bdag po dang //
T02D1443:250a-63: 'khor lo pa dang khang pa brtsegs ma rnams //
T02D1443:250a-64: snang bar byas te 'od gyur rim bzhin bsdu //
T02D1443:250a-65: h'um de yongs su gyur las bdag nyid ni //
T02D1443:250a-66: zhal gcig phyag gnyis g-yas brkyang gom pas gnas //
T02D1443:250a-67: lang tsho gzhon pa 'gying bag mtshan dang ldan //
T02D1443:250a-68: phyag rgya drug ldan dril bu rdo rje 'chang //
T02D1443:250a-69: de nas yongs su bsngo ba dang smon lam gdab pa dang /
T02D1443:250b-0: yi ge brgya pa brjod pa yang byas pa @250b lha'i nga rgyal gyis gnas par bya'o //
T02D1443:250b-1: gung dang phyi dro'i thun mtshams su //
T02D1443:250b-2: bsam gtan khang par stan bder 'dug / bdag nyid 'od zer du gyur pa //
T02D1443:250b-3: h'um du byas te yongs gyur las //
T02D1443:250b-4: bcom ldan 'khor lo bde mchog gi //
T02D1443:250b-6: khang brtsegs rin chen tshogs las grub //
T02D1443:250b-7: dur khrod brgyad bskor gsal dmigs nas //
T02D1443:250b-8: dbang bskur ba la sogs pa cho ga thams cad bya'o //
T02D1443:250b-9: thun tha ma la ni sngar bstan pa'i cho ga thams cad spyad la /
T02D1443:250b-10: bzlas brjod kyi rjes la h'um gi 'od zer gyis
T02D1443:250b-11: thams cad 'od du gyur pa bdag la bsdus la
T02D1443:250b-12: / bdag dang phag mo yang 'od du gyur pa snying ga'i shes rab yab yum la /
T02D1443:250b-13: de yang snying ga'i nyi ma dang bcas pa'i h'um la bsdu zhing /
T02D1443:250b-14: nyi ma dang a'u dang ha dang zla tshes dang /
T02D1443:250b-15: thig le dang n'a da'i bar du bsdus la n'a
T02D1443:250b-16: da yang dmigs pa med par byas la nyal lo
T02D1443:250b-17: // nangs par gyi dus su rdo rje rnal 'byor
T02D1443:250b-18: ma'i glus bskul bas sad par mos par byas la
T02D1443:250b-19: // / cho ga thams cad nyi ma snga ma bzhin du bya'o //
T02D1443:250b-20: h'um sngon rdo rje las byung ba //
T02D1443:250b-21: thugs kyi 'khor lo bde mchog ni //
T02D1443:250b-22: dbang bskur bdag po mi bskyod rgya //
T02D1443:250b-23: gzhan ma rnams ni sngar bzhin du //
T02D1443:250b-24: aom dmar padma las byung ba //
T02D1443:250b-25: gsung gi 'khor lo bde mchog ni //
T02D1443:250b-26: dmar po g-yon sdo padma bsnams //
T02D1443:250b-27: dbang bdag 'od rgya gzhan sngar bzhin //
T02D1443:250b-28: aom dkar 'khor lo las byung ba //
T02D1443:250b-29: sku yi 'khor lo bde mchog ni //
T02D1443:250b-30: dkar po g-yas sngo 'khor lo bsnams //
T02D1443:250b-31: dbad bdag rtags rgya gzhan sngar bzhin //
T02D1443:250b-32: tr'am ser rin chen las byung ba //
T02D1443:250b-33: yon tan 'khor lo bde mchog ni //
T02D1443:250b-34: ser po g-yas sngo rin chen bsnams //
T02D1443:250b-35: dbang bdag rin rgya gzhan sngar bzhin //
T02D1443:250b-36: kham ljang sna tshogs rdor byung ba'i //
T02D1443:250b-37: phrin las 'khor lo bde mchog ni //
T02D1443:250b-38: ljang gu steng sdo sna tshogs bsnams //
T02D1443:250b-39: dbang bdag don rgya gzhan sngar bzhin //
T02D1443:250b-40: de ltar gus pa dang bcas pas rgyun mi 'chad par bsgom pas sems brtan par gyur pa dang /
T02D1443:250b-41: rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i ting nge 'dzin bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1443:251a-2: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor las rdzogs pa //
T02D1443:251a-3: lte ba'i dbus su gnas par bsgom //
T02D1443:251a-4: de yi dbus su gnas pa yi //
T02D1443:251a-5: yi ge dam pa'i gnas bsgom bya //
T02D1443:251a-6: sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can //
T02D1443:251a-7: lha yi gzugs su bsgom par bya //
T02D1443:251a-8: de ni gzugs las 'das gyur pa //
T02D1443:251a-9: sems nyid du yang bsgom mi bya //
T02D1443:251a-10: bsam bya min par bsam de yang //
T02D1443:251a-11: sems nyid du ni mtshon pa min //
T02D1443:251a-12: de yang bsam bya min bsam bya //
T02D1443:251a-13: de las gzugs ni thob pa 'gyur //
T02D1443:251a-14: dang po ri dags sred bzhin snang ba ste //
T02D1443:251a-15: mtshan ma gnyis pa dud ka'i rnam pa can //
T02D1443:251a-16: gsum pa srin bu me khyer dang 'dra ba //
T02D1443:251a-17: bzhi pa sgron me 'bar ba lta bur gsal //
T02D1443:251a-18: mtshan ma lnga pa rnam par ma brtags par //
T02D1443:251a-19: sprin bral nam mkha' lta bur snang ba yin //
T02D1443:251a-20: de lta bu yi mtshan mtho ba nas ni //
T02D1443:251a-21: phyag rgya chen po thob par gyur pa yin //
T02D1443:251a-22: shr'i ni gnyis med ye shes te //
T02D1443:251a-23: he ni rgyu sogs stong pa nyid //
T02D1443:251a-24: ru ni rtog pa dang bral ba //
T02D1443:251a-25: ka ni gang na'ang mi gnas pa'o //
T02D1443:251a-26: sems ni ngal so rnal 'byor pa //
T02D1443:251a-27: mya ngan 'das pa bstan pa min //
T02D1443:251a-30: me tog sna tshogs lag na thogs //
T02D1443:251a-31: rgyal mtshan ba dan sna tshogs dang //
T02D1443:251a-32: rol mo'i sgra ni sna tshogs dang //
T02D1443:251a-33: glu yi mchod pa sna tshogs kyis //
T02D1443:251a-34: mkha' spyod gnas su khrid par byed //
T02D1443:251a-36: de ltar rje btsun he ru ka'i //
T02D1443:251a-37: sgrub thabs gsal bar byas pa las //
T02D1443:251a-38: dge ba thob pa gang yin des //
T02D1443:251a-39: 'gro kun rdo rje 'dzin gyur cig / bcom ldan 'das dpal 'khor lo bde mchog gi sgrub thabs /
T02D1443:251a-40: rin po che gtsug gi nor bu zhes bya ba /
T02D1443:251a-41: slob dpon chen po la pa pa'i zhal snga nas kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02D1443:251a-43: // / rgya gar gyi pandi ta chen po sum ti k'i rti dang ;
T02D1443:251a-44: bod kyi lo tsa ba mkhas pa chen po mar
